dialog.teller: There are trees in the background
dialog.drawer: Be more specific and tell me where in the page to draw. For example halfway up. one quarter up etc. Start with the foreground.

dialog.teller: Across the back there are trees and on the left side in the back you can see the tree trunks
in the middle there are rocks with a waterfall and in the very from there are flat rocks
sorry I meant very front of the picture there are flat rocks
dialog.drawer: is the waterfall the entire length of the picture? where does it start relative to the top and where does it end relative to the bottom?

dialog.drawer: Is there any sky in the photo?
